attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are seeing More and More of our farms closing down because they just can not compete with supermarket prices. We will not have a country side as we know it if the goverement does not help our farmers. 

"Charity starts at home" is a good saying here. For shouldn't we be protecting the welfare of our farmers and land before we protect those of the other countries. 

It won't be long before our children will only ever see a picture of a cow because people will not keep these animals as pets. 

It is time the goverment Help our country and our farmers keep their lively hoods and us to keep our country sides as we know them.
